title: It's Bernie vs. Everybody in the Democratic Game of Thrones with Robert Costa and Abby Livingston
description: Robert Costa and Abby Livingston join Chuck to talk about the Frontrunner in the Democratic field, who isn't a Democrat. Plus, is President Trump's border crisis good politics for 2020? And what else can we name after George Washington?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
